name: Selene: Art Deco vintage headband
description:
An original and rare Art Deco diamante-encrusted  crescent moon, reworked with 1950's ivory pearls. 

Worn with the crescent to the side, this statement piece is perfect for the bride-to-be who's drawn to Deco design.

The moon itself is 3.5 inchs by 3.3 inches

All La Belle pieces are made using antique & vintage finds, each one is unique; a one-off piece and design. 

Photo credit: Lauren McGlynn Photography 

This piece is now sold.

name: Victorian Flower & Pearl comb £65.00
description:
This vintage comb was created by reworking a brass Victorian flower brooch. 

1950's ivory pearls and a touch of 1950's marcasite were all combined to created a truly unique comb. 

Measure approx 9cm across. 

Photo credit: Lauren McGlynn Photography 

If you'd you like to try this on, please contact me to arrange a home studio visit.

name: Antique flower headband £195.00
description:
Ivory and antique pink French silk flowers, loops of ivory 1950's pearls and a trim of 1950's diamanté make up this unique headband. 

A piece of ivory tulle backs this delicate adornment. 

This handmade piece sits on a silver band. 

All La Belle Epoque pieces are one-off so once it's gone, it's gone.

Photo credit: Lauren McGlynn Photography 

If you'd you like to try this on, please contact me to arrange a home studio visit.

name: 1930's Antique Flower comb £65.00
description:
This pretty antique white flower circa 1930's, has been reworked with 1950's diamanté and twists of small ivory 1950's pearls. 

This comb works well worn to the side or towards the back of head with or without a veil attached. 

If you require more than one comb, I have an additional two white antique flowers which I can rework.

Photo credit: Lauren McGlynn Photography 

If you'd you like to try this on, please contact me to arrange a home studio visit.

name: Apollo: Golden Art Deco headband £85.00
description:
A unique golden Art Deco appliqué which is studded with clear diamanté.

Surrounded by creamy ivory 1950's pearls to create a stunning side headband. 

Photo credit: Lauren McGlynn Photography 

If you'd you like to try this on, please contact me to arrange a home studio visit.

name: Flight Art Deco wing vintage headband £159.00
description:
A dramatic Art Deco belt buckle wing is complemented by a trail of 50's diamanté and an additional looped Art Deco buckle.  


The wing measures 10.5cm in length; 6cm in width across the band.

Photo credit: Lauren McGlynn Photography 

If you'd you like to try this on, please contact me to arrange a home studio visit.

name: 1950's flowergirl headband and gloves
description:
A beautiful yellow and white 1950's head band flower wreath. 

This halo comes with matching yellow gloves, which close with delicate pearl buttons.

name: Autumn leaf comb duo
description:
Art Deco Mother of pearl leaves and ivory 50's pearls surround a little Deco bird. 

This large comb is paired with a matching mini comb which is adorned with 50's pearl and Deco leaf. 

Photo credit: Lauren McGlynn Photography

This piece is now sold, if you would like something similar please get in touch.

name: Vintage harvest double headband £159.00
description:
A sporadic mix of 1950's pearls, beads and leaf brooches. 

This golden double row headband is dotted with twists of Victorian milk seed beads. 

A unique one-off piece! 

Photo credit: Lauren McGlynn Photography 

If you'd you like to try this on, please contact me to arrange a home studio visit.

name: Demeter: Art Deco headband £85.00
description:
A clear diamanté studded original Art Deco flower appliqué, has been reworked with a strip of 1950's diamanté to create a pretty side headband. 

Photo credit: Lauren McGlynn Photography

name: Art Deco & 1950's Aurora vintage comb £55.00
description:
An Art Deco diamante encrusted applique set against clusters of 1950's Aurora crystal beads. 

This beautiful vintage comb measures approx 8cm across and can be worn with or without a birdcage veil. 

Like all La Belle Epoque pieces, each one is unique! 

Photo credit: Lauren McGlynn Photography

name: Nerina: Art Deco vintage headband £150.00
description:
This double headband reworks two strips of clear and bright Art Deco Diamante. 

Art Deco belt buckles have been reworked to create wave-like loops. 

Photo credit: Lauren McGlynn Photography 

If you'd you like to try this on, please contact me to arrange a home studio visit.

name: The Garden of Eden: vintage drop head band £150.00
description:
This stunning handmade band was created by reworking diamante Art Deco dress trim. It was then subtly studded with 50's ivory seed pearls. 

A small golden 30's bird-brooch rests in a cluster of twisted pearls and ivory antique velvet flowers with single pearl stigma. 

The statement side drop itself was created using a tassel of 20's diamante and hand-strung 50's pearls. 

As with all La Belle pieces, each one is unique; a one-off piece and design. 

The drop measures 3inchs. 

Photo credit: Lauren McGlynn Photography

name: Deposit for Bespoke Design Service
description:
In addition to my ready-to-wear collection...I offer a bespoke design service.

I can make a hair adornment just for you. 

Become a La Belle Epoque Bridal Belle! 

Please get in touch via email to discuss the design process and your requirements.

Before I can begin to make your piece please note a deposit must be offered (see suggested prices below).  

Normally the bespoke process takes approx four weeks. 

Although during busy periods the bespoke process can take up to eight weeks; I'll source the antiques, then design & craft your hair adornment.  

This process can be done via email, or if you live in the Glasgow area you can come and visit me in my home studio. 

If you have any further questions please don't hesitate to get in touch.

name: Original Art Deco diamante belt
description:
An original Art Deco belt. 

This studded diamante belt closes with an iconic Deco arrow buckle. 

This piece is in superb condition for it's age. 

26inch approx. UK size 6. 

In my collection I have another Art Deco belt (second photograph) which is 28inch approx. UK size 8/10. 

This original belt is in great condition but closes with a bow like clasp.

name: Rococo vintage hair comb £65.00
description:
A unique circa 1940's heart-shaped Rococo brooch, which is very Miriam Haskell in style. 

The brooch - adorned with gold leaves and silver tone pearls - has been reworked with wing-like vintage silver shells.  

This adaptable comb suits many styles of wear; to the side of head or to the back.  All my combs can be easily worn with, or used to secure, most veils.



The comb measures approx 8cm across. 

Photo credit: Lauren McGlynn Photography

name: Art Deco and 1950's pearl vintage comb
description:
An original large Art Deco clear diamante studded circle, surrounded by creamy 1950's ivory pearls. 

This statement comb can be worn to the back of the head or at the side. 

Like all La Belle pieces, each and everyone is unique a one-off. 

I only rework vintage and antique finds. No modern pearls or beads are used in any of my pieces. 

Please note this piece is now sold, if you'd like me to design something similar please get in touch.

Photo credit: Lauren McGlynn Photography

name: Hermes: Art Deco wing headband £150.00
description:
This band is inspired by depictions of the Greek messenger God Hermes. A dramatic Art Deco belt buckle wing is complemented by a trail of 50's diamanté.


The wing measures 10.5cm in length; 6cm in width across the band. 

Photo credit: Lauren McGlynn Photography

name: Flower girl Coalport band £65.00
description:
Pretty vintage headband reworking 40's Coalport china flower brooches.

Surrounded by a sporadic mix of 50's clear aurora crystal beads  and Mother of pearl buttons.


Each flower girl band is made to order.

Please note; as all Coalport bands are handmade to order, and to your own personal requirements, this process can take up to four weeks.

If you have any questions about this process, please get in touch.

name: Bespoke 1950's diamante and pearl vintage comb £65.00
description:
This vintage comb consists of two 1950's clear diamanté spray brooches,  reworked with 1950's ivory pearls. 

Please note the comb in the picture has been sold. 

However I can design and make you a similar comb. 

The second photo shows a selection of La Belle bespoke 50's combs. 

Please send me an email to discuss.
 
All combs can be worn with or without a veil.

Length is approx 9cm

name: Primose: 1940's China flower band £160.00
description:
Cluster of 40's china flower brooches and 50's pearls make up this pretty and unique band. 

A large loop of clear 50's diamanté add a subtle  touch of sparkle. 

The sides are finished with rows of 50's ivory pearls. 

Photo credit: Lauren McGlynn Photography  

If you'd you like to try this on, please contact me to arrange a home studio visit.

name: Art Deco Diamante vintage comb £55.00
description:
This stylish comb was created by reworking an Art Deco buckle with strips of  1920's diamante. 

Approx measures 8cm across. This vintage comb suits many styles of wear; to the side of head or to the back. All my combs can be easily worn with, or used to secure, most veils.

Like all La Belle pieces, each one is unique.

name: Bespoke hair pins using antique finds
description:
From antique aurora crystal beads and pearl & diamanté clusters, to antique Mother of pearl buttons.

Each vintage hair pin is unique & adds a little vintage "something old" to your hair. 

When you place your order please email me with details, such as colour or era. You can even send on a picture of your dress. 

Pins available; small kirby, blonde/brown, larger silver plated hair pins (as pictured) for placing into buns or up styles.  

Please let me know which type and colour of pin you require. 

In addition please let me know if you would prefer me to use gold or silver wire. 

Once finished I will email a photo to ensure you're happy.

Two "small" pins & two "large" pins £30.00. 

All pins are sent gift-wrapped, first class recorded. 

If you need any more information please don't hesitate to get in touch!

name: Jet Art Deco & 1950's pearls headband £150.00
description:
A large beautiful Art Deco appliqué with a central jet stone. 

This stunning central piece is surrounded by 1950's ivory pearls.  

Please note, this piece is at a stockist.
